name: Momentary Hotdog Build 4
description:
This is a short silly fps about running, jumping and shooting while keeping your hot mitts on the hotdog that you found while fending off all manner of sneaky pests who want it.

It's also a work in progress.

--Controls the game doesn't teach you--

Reset level: T
Butt stomp: Left Control
Shoot: Left Click
Zoom: Right Click
Settings: Escape

If you can, could you please record yourself playing and send me the footage? 

I learn A LOT from watching gameplay so if you could I'd be super grateful. OBS is a free screen capture software that's easy to get set up and start recording. If you need help getting it working just give me a yell.
